originalText.text: Moved to Roosevelt Island a month and a half ago and have already blown through my first class pack with Island OM because I've enjoyed the classes so much! As someone with physical limitations, the instructors (particularly Jax and Charmaine) have been incredibly helpful in suggesting modifications that match my needs. Jax and Island OM have definitely played a big part in me feeling at home here on the Island.

text.text: Moved to Roosevelt Island a month and a half ago and have already blown through my first class pack with Island OM because I've enjoyed the classes so much! originalText.text: I am so happy I joined this studio. I love all the classes - from Pilates to Barre to Yin with sound. As a person trying to be fit after years of all cardio and zero strength training, the chill/stretchy classes have saved me on Tue, Fri, and Sunday nights. They help unravel the tightness from Pilates and Barre, which have challenged me a ton ( in a good way).

originalText.text:
I love Island OM! As someone who has been born and raised on Roosevelt Island, I've seen how it's changed over the years...and some changes have taken away from the neighborhood feel and community charm of the island. However, Island OM is what Roosevelt Island has been needing. And I'm so grateful it's finally here. The classes are incredible. Teachers are awesome. No matter your level of experience, you will never feel judged either by the teachers or others in the class. You can always go at your own pace.
Thank you Island OM team for creating an amazing space for movement, connection and community!

originalText.text:
I took a barre class at Island OM and loved it.
It was not too difficult but provided appropriate challenge. The teacher offered modifications to make the class easier and then when she saw that I could do all the exercises, she started adding modification for more challenge.

I definitely want to go back but I'm only visiting the area.
Harriete

originalText.text: Just an incredible Class! Charmaine is highly professional and uses every second of her time to ensure students work out. It is one of my favorite classes; I wish I could have this class every day! Thanks, Charmaine, for inspiring us to come to your class as early as 6:30 am, and before running to work:) It wouldn't be possible without students' high motivation and passion! Great job!
